Empowering Communities with Smart Finance & Delivery

Greenn provides accessible micro-lending and efficient motorbike logistics across Lusaka.

About Greenn

Greenn is a grassroots Zambian enterprise focused on short-term collateral lending and on-demand delivery. We help individuals unlock economic potential through asset-backed loans, food/parcel delivery, and rider fleet support.

Our Services

  • Micro-Lending: Fast, flexible asset-backed loans with structured buy-back agreements.
  • Motorbike Delivery: Efficient delivery for food, parcels, and small business dispatch.
  • Fleet Leasing: Lease motorbikes to trusted riders operating on platforms like Yango.
